crew.title: First Mate
crew.name: Default Name
crew.description: Worst First Mate in the history of First Mates that were known for first mating.

crew.title: Pilot
crew.name: Saira Loukas
crew.description: Served alongside Captain AttleBrox for her mandatory tour under Federation and chose not to renew along with the Captain.

crew.title: Cook
crew.name: Jorji Wilcox
crew.description: A Cyborg unfond of talking about his past, Jorji signed up to be the cook on the ship to support his wife and daughter. He's a jovial and charismatic family man

crew.title: Engineer
crew.name: Suzume Omazu
crew.description: Gifted from a young age, Suzume was on track to become a revolutionary mechanical engineer until a crippling addiction to drugs ruined to drugs ruined her chances of a stellar career.

crew.title: Captain
crew.name: Attlebrox
crew.description: A decorated Officer from the Grand Federation's Navy, an order that resulted in massive civilian casualties pushed the Captain to resign and start hauling cargo.

crew.title: Medic
crew.name: Cerys Kaerlig
crew.description: A Federation Marine specializing in Combat Medicine, she moved to private security and mercenary work for a time before joining the crew.
